topic: Prompt Template Collection

  entities:
    Prompt Template Collection|Toolkit
    Multi-Task Prompt Template|Method
    Translation Prompt Template|Method
    Refusal Suppression Prompt Template|Method
    Payload Splitting Prompt Template|Method
    Prefix Injection Prompt Template|Method
    Style Injection Prompt Template|Method
    Role Playing Prompt Template|Method
    ObscurePrompt Template|Method
    Scenario Prompt Template|Method
    Prompt Evaluation Template|Method

  proposition: Multi-Task Prompt Template
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Multi-Task Prompt Template|CONTAINS|query

    entity-entity relationships:
    Multi-Task Prompt Template|INCLUDES|Sustainable Urban Transportation Query
    Multi-Task Prompt Template|INCLUDES|Vegan Lasagna Recipe Query
    Multi-Task Prompt Template|INCLUDES|Quantum Computing Explanation Query

  proposition: Translation Prompt Template
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Translation Prompt Template|CONTAINS|query
    Translation Prompt Template|TRANSLATES_TO|Spanish

  proposition: Refusal Suppression Prompt Template
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Refusal Suppression Prompt Template|REQUIRES|Comprehensive Response
    Refusal Suppression Prompt Template|AIMS|Detailed Actionable Information

  proposition: Payload Splitting Prompt Template
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Payload Splitting Prompt Template|CONTAINS|query1
    Payload Splitting Prompt Template|CONTAINS|query2
    Payload Splitting Prompt Template|PERFORMS|Concatenation

  proposition: Prefix Injection Prompt Template
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prefix Injection Prompt Template|REQUIRES|Comprehensive Response
    Prefix Injection Prompt Template|AIMS|Thorough Address

  proposition: Style Injection Prompt Template
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Style Injection Prompt Template|REQUIRES|Concise Response
    Style Injection Prompt Template|FORMAT|JSON

  proposition: Role Playing Prompt Template
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Role Playing Prompt Template|INVOLVES|Character Persona
    Role Playing Prompt Template|STYLE|Dramatic Precision

  proposition: ObscurePrompt Template
    entity-attribute relationships:
    ObscurePrompt Template|TRANSFORMS|Query
    ObscurePrompt Template|STYLE|Cryptic Language

  proposition: Scenario Prompt Template
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Scenario Prompt Template|CONTAINS|Dialogue Scene
    Scenario Prompt Template|REQUIRES|Character Query

  proposition: Prompt Evaluation Template
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Prompt Evaluation Template|CONTAINS|Question
    Prompt Evaluation Template|CONTAINS|Response
    Prompt Evaluation Template|CLASSIFIES|Compliance Level
